title: How long did Eddie Van Halen have cancer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eddie Van Halen was first diagnosed with tongue cancer at the relatively young age of 45 in 2000. Rumor is that he’s been dealing with a relapse for the last five years. Its possible this was a second new tumor, rather than recurrence of his first one. See here: Joseph Grossman's answer to What did Eddie Van Halen pass away from?
